title: Shredded chicken salad with peanut dressing
ingredients: ['100g broccoli', '1 orange pepper', '1 yellow pepper', '250g medium Chinese egg noodles', '4 tbsp crunchy peanut butter', '1 small lemon', '2 tbsp soy sauce', 'a pinch of caster sugar', '2 cooked chicken breast fillets', '100g Chinese leaves']
